title: The Play Icon Is Not Working.
body: hello I am having troubles getting the play icon to start, the internet connection is fine but its not doing the load thing that it does every time I get on league of legends. I have also tried logging out and that didn't work either. any thoughts on the matter?

replies.body: An unresponsive Play icon can be caused by a few different factors like bad a connection blocking it or a patching issue during the update.   I suggest starting off with a repair to make sure you game data was updated with issue.  Fastest way to do that would be by downloading the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and performing a repatch.  Let me know if it helps!
